title: Best of The Herd: 05/13/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/13/2019
description:
Colin breaks down the hot mess in the NBA called the Philadelphia 76ers and gives them two options. Stephen Curry is by far the least respected star in the league because he doesn't give off the tough guy persona like Russell Westbrook or James Harden. The Lakers are now openly trolling LeBron after hiring Frank Vogel, and another weekly recap in this riveting edition of “Where Colin was Right & Wrong!"  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
